Texts.Chs: 很高兴见到你。我还是希望你别在这里惹啥麻烦。
Texts.Eng: Good to meet you. I hope you're not here to cause trouble.

Texts.Chs: 你好啊朋友。恰谈公事请与老板商谈。
Texts.Eng: Hey friend. Speak to the boss if you're here on business.

Texts.Chs: 你好啊朋友。你不会干坏事的，对吧？
Texts.Eng: Hey there. You're not going to cause trouble, right?

Texts.Chs: 嘿，你是守护者吗？我以为你们都随船溺毙了。我猜你那天有事情错开了。
Texts.Eng: Hey, are you a Protector? I thought you all went down with the ship. Guess you were too busy that day

Texts.Chs: 你好，伙伴。请注意不要打扰我的牧群，否则我们会有冲突，希望你明白我的意思。
Texts.Eng: Howdy partner. Take care you don't disturb my flock here or we'll have a little fallin' out, if you catch my drift.

Texts.Chs: 你好啊。如果你是来谈生意的，请和头儿聊一聊。
Texts.Eng: Howdy there. Have a chat with the head honcho if you're here for business.

Texts.Chs: 我一直梦想着在太空工作，虽然我也想过拥有一个可以回去的家。
Texts.Eng: I always dreamed of working in space. I figured I'd have a home to go back to, though.

Texts.Chs: 我从来不相信宇宙之寂寥，直到我亲眼看到它。
Texts.Eng: I never believed how big space was till I saw it for myself.

Texts.Chs: 我真的需要一份新工作。我想知道莱西亚是不是在招人？
Texts.Eng: I really need a new job. I wonder if Letheia are hiring?

Texts.Chs: 这里感觉有几百开尔文，是所有人都这么热还是只有我觉得热？
Texts.Eng: It feels like hundreds of kelvin in here, is it this hot for everyone or just me?

Texts.Chs: 请把你们的武器放在皮套里。我最近已经看够了暴力。
Texts.Eng: Keep your weapons holstered, please. I've seen enough violence lately.

Texts.Chs: 保安，还是安保？等一下，争论这个没有意义。
Texts.Eng: Keepin' safe, or safely keepin'? Hang on, that don't make sense.

Texts.Chs: 在太空工作并不那么糟糕，只要你习惯了与你的老板打交道。
Texts.Eng: Working in space isn't so bad, once you get used to hotbunking with your boss.

Texts.Chs: 你骑着那辆锈迹斑斑的车飞来了？你比牛仔更勇敢。
Texts.Eng: You flew in on that rustbucket? You're braver than this cowboy.

Texts.Chs: 你来这里是为了招聘广告吗？他们选择了我，对不起。
Texts.Eng: You here about the job advert? They picked me, sorry.
